reviews.review: Move over Darth Vader, Thanos is here.

aN EMOTIONAL AND EXCITING THRILL RIDE FROM START TO FINISH, IT HAS EVERYTHING i COULD HAVE WANTED AND MORE. tHANOS WAS A SHOWSTOPPER AND BY FAR THE BEST MARVEL VILLAIN. A MUST SEE MOVIE FOR ANY COMIC BOOK FAN.
Top entertainment, more fun and storytelling than Black Panther or Thor Ragnarok!

AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR!!!!
My son was crying when a particular event took place at the end of this movie....
Our family was SHOOK!! 
Much like my review of Black Panther, this is one of those movies that included multiple elements: 
Great story, lovable characters, EMOTIONAL, spectacular visuals, appeals to all ages, can make you laugh and cry all in the span of 2 and a half hours!! 
This movie does it all..and then some!!
This movie is amazing! Some minor issues but nothing that broke the movie. 
When you pay attention to the details it connects so well!!
The darkest MCU movie ever and rightfully so! Even the signature opening for the MCU movies began with a dark tone rather than its usual upbeat and triumphant music that plays as the characters are on display! 
It was a bit more fast-paced than what fans are probably used to with MCU movies yet, 
it was able to deliver multiple times! 
Thanos is what he should be! Strong, Powerful, Intimidating, Brooding 
and a Fierce Warrior. He proved his might clearly within the first 5 minutes just as Marvel Studios' President, Kevin Feige had promised! Whenever he collected one of the Infinity Stones, he used each of them in a unique and powerful way. He had the guts to do what others could not do in order for planets to survive. He was the example of sheer will and determination. He would let nothing stand in the way of his mission. He would torture and kill to fulfill what he thought was right. He had some lines of dialogue where you could see multiple layers of depth that makes him who he is and his reasoning. Yet, he still seemed to love no one outside of Gamora! This guy was COMPLEX!!
10 years..And Marvel paid us off nicely!! I've seen it twice already! 
Avoid all spoilers, don't ask anyone what happens in the movie!! Go see this movie for yourself!! 
Marvel Studios..You did it again!! 
(It is going to be a long year waiting for part 4)
#GoldenAgeOfSuperHeroMovies
The perfect culmination to the greatest movie series of all time. beautiful cinematography and action all the way through

The movie 10 years in the making. It's an emotional roller coaster from start to finish. You need to sit through the credits just to collect yourself and process everything you see, and then you're hit with the end credit scene that helps set up what happens next.
Watched it last night. Holy Cow, this movie is a blast! A 1 of 2 that really seems whole. felt like what happened in my mind reading these comics back in the day.

This movie is truly perfection another big hit, not suprise at all from Marvel. I was truly not ready for this all. And Thanos looks so freakin badass and realistic so is the black Order. I can go on all day about this movie it truly deserves all that wait and just can't wait for Phase 4.

Only a few seconds into the movie and you're whip-lashed along a roaller coaster of dire plot lines, gripping action and character development.  Infinity War packs in a dizzying amount of emotion that's more varied and gripping than I would have expected.  It's a killer story against which I can only hold minor grievances.  In all the story delivers and the balance of genuinely comedic and tragic elements wins the day.
Best damn marvel movie to date
